subject: Basketball
Women and Girls
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Lisa Leslie, one of the W.N.B.A.’s original players in 1997, will retire at the age of 37 as the league’s career leader in scoring and rebounding, and as one of its most recognizable pioneers.
snippet: Lisa Leslie, one of the W.N.B.A.’s original players in 1997, will retire at the age of 37 as the league’s career leader in scoring and rebounding, and as one of its most recognizable pioneers.
